entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -28.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -28.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -31.5°C
Wind: SW 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 57 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
